review: Good explanation and keeping patient warmed without amplifying the issue. He was also very friendly and polite.
Doctor was very friendly.  Listen to my problems.  And gave proper advice.  No extra test or medication were advised
Nicely explained the issue and told in detail about it to make comfortable decision. It was worth visiting relieved from unnecessary stress.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very amiable, and was able to pin point the problem in my shoulder and the cause of the same. the explanation of the condition and solutions for the pain. *** ******** *** ********** ****** * ***** *****
Dr was very friendly and explained the issues well and also suggested next steps. I would recommend.
